name: In stock framed intaglios from Quatrefoil Design
description:
Our in stock, custom framed intaglios are sold individually. There is no order minimum. The image in this listing shows a representative design.

For a quick look at all of our in stock intaglio designs, please visit http://www.flickr.com/photos/86190115@N08/sets/72157636878137965/

One of our favorite things is a beautiful framed series, hung in just the right spot. 

Particularly striking are framed intaglios, which beautifully combine the striking visual of a series with a sense of history, sculpture, and art.

We think the custom framed intaglios from Quatrefoil Design are among the best ones out there!  Our signature frame is beautifully molded – it has presence, but does not overwhelm the intaglios.  Our frame is designed to work well when seeing the intaglios head on (such as when they are mounted on a wall and primarily viewed from in front); our frame works equally well when the intaglios are mounted in a spot where the side profile of the frame is seen. The frame is even versatile enough to be used when a framed intaglio is going to be displayed in a bookshelf.

Our frames are gilded by hand by artists, and the intaglios are mounted in our custom designs using reproductions from a collection of privately held antique intaglios.  The result is truly one of a kind and special.

To see our intaglio designs, please visit http://quatrefoildesign.bigcartel.com/category/intaglios.  Any questions, please email quatrefoildesign@gmail.com.

options.name: Hand gilded warm silver custom frame

name: Special order custom framed intaglios from Quatrefoil Design - (sold individually)
description:
Please note: our custom framed intaglios are sold individually, with a minimum order of three. The image in this listing shows a representative group of four, which are priced at $365 each.

For a quick look at all of our special order intaglio designs, please visit http://www.flickr.com/photos/86190115@N08/sets/72157636908461244/

One of our favorite things is a beautiful framed series, hung in just the right spot. 

Particularly striking are framed intaglios, which beautifully combine the striking visual of a series with a sense of history, sculpture, and art.

We think the custom framed intaglios from Quatrefoil Design are among the best ones out there!  Our signature frame is beautifully molded – it has presence, but does not overwhelm the intaglios.  Our frame is designed to work well when seeing the intaglios head on (such as when they are mounted on a wall and primarily viewed from in front); our frame works equally well when the intaglios are mounted in a spot where the side profile of the frame is seen. The frame is even versatile enough to be used when a framed intaglio is going to be displayed in a bookshelf.

Our frames are gilded by hand by artists, and the intaglios are mounted in our custom designs using reproductions from a collection of privately held antique intaglios.  The result is truly one of a kind and special.

We also pride ourselves on working closely with our customers on custom options.  We have mounted our intaglios on 100 year old Belgian linen, customer’s own material, custom selected matboard (we use Crescent matboard, which comes in hundreds of colors), silk.  We have also custom designed intaglio patterns based on a specific frame requirement, and hand colored both the intaglio and the band on the edge of the intaglio based on any paint color.  An upcharge may apply.

Our framed intaglios are sold individually, with no minimum order.  Our standard small size is 12 3/4" x 16" (priced at $365), and our standard large size is 17 5/8" x 21 5/8" (priced at $450). Each frame is custom made to order, so any size is possible - please email for quote. 

Gold frame – inner mat off white, outer mat off white, intaglio edge painted to match frame color.

Light or aged ‘Gilver’ (warm silver) frame (see http://bit.ly/PfHsG0 for examples) – inner mat off white, outer mat off white, intaglio edge painted to match frame color.  We also offer a ‘gilver’ contrast option – the intaglio is mounted on a khaki inner mat, with an off white outer mat.

Silver – inner mat dark grey, outer mat light gray. Also available with inner mat light grey, outer mat white. Intaglio edge painted to match the frame color.

Our lead time tends to be 6-8 weeks, but may be 4 weeks if one of our standard designs is selected. Each order is made custom, so size and color modifications are certainly possible (an upcharge may apply).

To see our custom intaglio designs, please visit http://quatrefoildesign.bigcartel.com/category/intaglios.  Any questions, please email quatrefoildesign@gmail.com.

options.name: Small size - 12 3/4" x 16" , in hand leafed gold, gilver (warm silver), or silver frame
Large size - 17 5/8" x 21 5/8", in hand leafed gold, gilver (warm silver), or silver frame

name: Intaglio sampler - color examples
description:
We have had more and more requests for intaglios that are tinted to match the decor of a room.  This makes the intaglios very custom and quite beautiful!

Any of our designs are available in custom colorways - this is just an small sample of what we can do.  We can match any paint color, just ask! A small upcharge may apply.

name: Custom framed agates from Quatrefoil Design (sold individually)
description:
Announcing a new addition to the Quatrefoil Design store - one of a kind framed agates. I am absolutely in love with these - they are so beautiful, so custom, so one of kind.

The image is representative of a grouping, the framed agates are sold individually. Price ranges from $325 - $375 based on agate and frame size.

We will update our store site with our current inventory of framed agates (click here to see current inventory).  We hand select each and every agate that is framed – selections are made based on size, consistency, character of the agate, color, and grain pattern.  Many of our agates are selected with groupings in mind. 

Agates most commonly come in natural tones (browns, blacks, taupes, tans); teal blues; sapphire blues; orange-red tones; purples; and fuschia.  If you think agates might work for your project, please contact us at quatrefoildesign@gmail.com to see whether we can custom create a grouping for you!

Our framed agates are sold individually.  Standard frame is bamboo style with our signature ‘gilver’ (warm silver) finish.  Can be framed in any size, with different finish or different frame style. An upcharge may apply.

Pricing ranges from $295-$365 depending on size of agates and frame.

name: Frame and mat samples for framed intaglios
description:
Sample pack of frame and mat samples for our most popular 
'gilver' finish (warm silver) and gold finish.  Silver frame and mat sample upon request.

name: In stock: special spring collection of framed intaglios, design as seen (1)
description:
Reproduction intaglios, made from original antiques that are unique and owned privately, custom framed and made to order. Custom framed in hand leafed gold frame.  Frame is exquisite quality, with a gorgeous carved pattern (see this picture for detail - http://bit.ly/11S4pVo).

One gold frame available for immediate shipment. This design can be custom ordered in silver or 'gilver' (silver-gold) finish, lead time 4 weeks.

For more information on our custom framed intaglios, please see http://www.quatrefoildesign.com/information-about-framed-intaglios.html.

For more information on our return and shipping policies, please see http://www.quatrefoildesign.com/faq.html.

name: Custom framed antique French document, one of a kind (I)
description:
Wonderful and rare antique French document from the early 19th century (c. 1816).  Custom framed in an elegant and clean lined hand painted black frame with carved rounded corners and a silver leaf lip.

This item is totally unique and one of a kind.  The outside measurement of the frame is 13 1/2 x 17.

Antique French documents look beautiful hung as part of a series, and can frequently be seen in the most beautiful homes featured in magazines and books.

We have six available already framed. Sold individually. Available for immediate shipment.

Questions? Please email quatrefoildesign@gmail.com

name: Original art by Christina Baker - Washed Away, 8"x8"
description:
Beautiful original art by Christina Baker.  

Acrylic on gallery wrapped canvas, this piece is called 'Washed Away' and measures 8"x8". It comes wired and ready to hang.

Versatile small format - perfect for bringing the beauty of custom art to any space! Works well hung alone, grouped with other small paintings, or even placed on an easel and displayed on a side table or a bookshelf!

name: Original art - abstract watercolor and pencil  - set of four
description:
One of my new favorite discoveries! I absolutely adore this series of abstract watercolor and pencil art.

This charming series, created by an Atlanta area artist, is collected by several lead Atlanta designers and architects. The whimsical and lyrical lines and pops of color make it the perfect addition to a bookcase, a gallery wall, or a new collection.

This set of four are sold together as a group - they work beautifully together.  Each image measures 3.5"x3.5"; each outer frame measures 9 3/4" x 9 3/4".

Note: watermark image is for online display only, and does not appear on actual artwork. Questions? Please email quatrefoildesign@gmail.com.

name: Antique French documents
description:
Wonderful and rare antique French legal documents, from the 18th, 19th, and early 20th centuries.  These look beautiful framed and hung as part of a series, and can frequently be seen in the most beautiful homes featured in magazines and books.

These are sold unframed, but can be custom framed to your specifications.

I have a large collection of antique French documents, and they are priced per document.  These have become very hard to find; my collection was amassed several years ago.  Base price is one unframed, although they are available custom framed in your choice of black frame with gold inset, warm silver or gold frame.

For more images of the collection, please email quatrefoildesign@gmail.com.  As these are antique documents, the color of the paper may vary from document to document, but all have a beautiful mellow look and are in excellent condition.  Second picture indicates how they look when framed.

name: Custom framed intaglios - "The Joni"
description:
Inspired by Joni of Cote de Texas, a classic and clean design of two intaglios perfectly framed. Sold individually, but available in two different designs if a set of two is purchased (this is a popular option). Measures 18" x 22" (outer measurement).

The intaglio pattern will be mounted as seen in this picture, but as it is a custom product, it may vary slightly from what is shown in this picture.

For more information on our custom framed intaglios, frame and mat colors, please see http://www.quatrefoildesign.com/information-about-framed-intaglios.html

For more pictures and other inspiration, please see our blog:
http://www.quatrefoildesign.blogspot.com/. 

For a great close up of our frame finishes in natural light, please see:
http://tinyurl.com/2engflp

Each item is custom made. Please allow 4-6 weeks lead time.  Trade pricing available, please inquire at quatrefoildesign@gmail.com.

For more information on our return and shipping policies, please see http://www.quatrefoildesign.com/faq.html

name: Custom framed intaglios, square size
description:
For certain spaces, or in combination with our large size of framed intaglios, a square size is the perfect solution.  Featuring one intaglio matted according to your specifications (wide or narrow), this makes a striking design.

Our square frame design, with a special price for a set of four.   Shown in gilver with off white outer mat, taupe inner mat for contrast; any of our frame/mat combinations are available (gold frame/cream mat; gilver frame/off white mat; silver frame/gray mat). The outer dimensions of this design measure 15 5/8" wide by 16 1/8" high (for perspective), and the mat opening is available in either the tightly cropped 4"x4", or a 6"x6" opening (both pictured, scroll through the pictures - control is under the main picture).

options.name: Gold, silver, or warm silver frame

name: The Cote de Texas intaglio grouping
description:
Inspired by a design from Joni of Cote de Texas, our newest offering is a sophisticated and beautiful grouping. (Please note: this photographed very dark)

The large frames in the center feature two intaglios and a close cropped mat to emphasize the beauty of the form; the large frames measure 18"x 22" outer dimensions.  The two large frames are flanked by two square frames on either side; the square frames measure 16" wide x 16" high. Six framed items are included in this grouping (2 large, 4 square).

Available in all of our frame finishes - gold with cream inner and outer mat, gilver (silver base with gold glaze) with off white inner and outer mat, silver with dark gray outer mat, light gray inner mat.


Custom mat colors or customer's own material possible with an upcharge. Please email for more information - quatrefoildesign@gmail.com/.

For a great close up of our frame finishes in natural light, please see:
http://tinyurl.com/2engflp

name: The Holly intaglio grouping
description:
Inspired by a gallery like wall hangings, yet with a dose of order and symmetry, our newest offering is a sophisticated and beautiful grouping. 

Each of the mats feature a single intaglios and a mat cropped to emphasize the beauty of the form; the large frames measure 19 5/8" x 25 5/8" outer dimensions. The two large frames are flanked by two square frames on either side; the square frames measure 16" wide by 16" high. Six framed items are included in this grouping (2 large, 4 square).

Modified version, seen in the second image, allows for your own artwork to be included in the design, and includes 5 framed items (1 large, 4 square).

Available in all of our frame finishes - gold with cream inner and outer mat, gilver (silver base with gold glaze) with off white inner and outer mat, silver with dark gray outer mat, light gray inner mat.  Picture shows the 'gilver' finish.

Custom mat colors or customer's own material possible with an upcharge. Please email for more information - quatrefoildesign@gmail.com.

If you want a slight change in size, mat cropping, or intaglio choice - don't hesitate to ask! Everything is created custom, so changes are certainly possible.  We show two options in the pictures here. Trade pricing available, please inquire at quatrefoildesign@gmail.com

For a great close up of our frame finishes in natural light, please see:
http://tinyurl.com/2engflp

options.name: Modified version (1 large frame, 4 square frames)

Gold, silver, or 'gilver' (warm silver), each measures 17 5/8" x 21 5/8"

name: Framed intaglios, set of four
description:
Our framed intaglios look striking in groups.  When ordering, please note the designs that you would like included in your order.  We will confirm your choice before creating the framed intaglios. 

You can mix and match, or use the combinations that we came up with with the guidance of a leading designer.  For more pictures, please see: 

http://quatrefoildesign.blogspot.com/2009/10/recommended-sets-of-four.html

Charlotte, Nate, Faith, Kendall (The Harris Trail) 

Olivia, Hanna Riley, Elyse, Sarah (The Huntcliff) 

Paris, Isabel, Ansley, Richard (The Mooresmill)     
                     
Brandon, Davis, Julie, Laura (The Rivermeade) - pictured

Charlotte, Davis, Elyse, Faith (The Riverview)

Isabel, Nate, Olivia, Richard (The Tuxedo)

Each item is custom made. Please allow 4-6 weeks lead time.

name: Framed intaglios, set of nine
description:
Nothing looks more striking on a wall than a full set of 9 framed intaglios (unless it is a set of 12 or 20!).

Special volume pricing for this set of 9. Each design can be purchased individually as well, for smaller groupings.

Available in gold, silver, or 'gilver' (warm silver). Intaglio color customizable.

Other groupings of nine available - our intaglios mix and match beautifully

name: Framed intaglios, set of 12
description:
Nothing looks more striking on a wall than a full set of 12 framed intaglios.

We have many intaglios designs, and can create a set of 12 with 12 different designs.

Alternatively, you may select 6 of our designs, and we will create a set of 12 by using the 6 designs as the basis, then creating the other 6 as a modified version (using different sizes and shape intaglios, but using the same general pattern). This creates a unique rhythm to the set.

Please see our blog post on sets of 12 for more ideas:
http://bit.ly/No36tr

name: Architectural Rendering: Rosette (limited edition)
description:
Award winning architect Jonathan Lacrosse was commissioned to hand draw a series of architectural renderings in graphite; the renderings can be hung alone or as part of a series. They are reminiscent of 18th and 19th century engravings, and recapture an art that is all but lost in the modern day world.

The first in our exclusive series is a charming rosette. This rosette is surrounded by a moulding motif referred to as “bead and reel”, and is drawn from The Augustan Cornice from the Temple of Concord. This cornice is currently displayed in the Tabularium at the Capotiline Museum in Rome, Italy.

The original is a one of a kind rendering. Art quality giclees were created from the original rendering in an exclusive and limited production of 100. Each giclee is individually produced through a high-resolution, high-fidelity process using a special large format art printer on thick archival art paper, and is signed and numbered by the artist. The giclees are exquistely and finely crafted, and as detailed as the original.

This item is unframed. Item for sale is a limited edition giclee.  The archival art paper is 11 1/8" x 11 1/8", the image itself is 7 3/4 x 8.   The paper is  thick and extremely high quality. 

Note: artist retains copyright to rendering. Cannot be reproduced for sale  Watermark image is for internet display purposes, and does not appear on the actual rendering.

name: Architectural Rendering: Egg and Dart Fragment (limited edition)
description:
Award winning architect Jonathan Lacrosse was commissioned to hand draw a series of architectural renderings in graphite; the renderings can be hung alone or as part of a series. They are reminiscent of 18th and 19th century engravings, and recapture an art that is all but lost in the modern day world.

The third in our exclusive architectural series is an egg and dart fragment. This fragment was salvaged from a historic Tennessee Theatre that has recently been restored. The fragment shows examples of two types classical architectural elements. Egg and Dart and Detils (the latin word for teeth). Examples can be found all through antiquity, from The Acropoplis to the ancient Roman Forum. During the Renaissance these motifs were reintroduced into Western Architecture and continue to this day.

The original is a one of a kind rendering. Art quality giclees were created from the original rendering in an exclusive and limited production of 100. Each giclee is individually produced through a high-resolution, high-fidelity process using a special large format art printer on thick archival art paper, and is signed and numbered by the artist. The giclees are exquistely and finely crafted, and as detailed as the original.

This item is unframed. The item for sale is a limited edition giclee.

Note: artist retains copyright to rendering. Cannot be reproduced for sale.  Watermark image is for internet display purposes, and does not appear on the actual rendering.

options.name: Egg and dart rendering, custom framed

name: Architectural rendering: Greek Key (limited edition)
description:
Award winning architect Jonathan Lacrosse was commissioned to hand draw a series of architectural renderings in graphite; the renderings can be hung alone or as part of a series. They are reminiscent of 18th and 19th century engravings, and recapture an art that is all but lost in the modern day world.

The fourth in our exclusive series is a striking Greek Key, or Meander.
 
The term Meander recalls the twisting and turning path of the Meander river located in present day Turkey.  It is a motif that has been used throughout antiquity to our current day, in Western and non-Western cultures.
 
The particular example was modeled after a design used by Architect Philip T. Shutze on a door for his Regency styled offices of the Insurance division for the Historic Citizens & Southern Bank in Atlanta, Georgia.  

Unframed rendering image is 4.75 x 15 (overall paper size 7.75 x 18)  Can be signed by the artist with vertical or horizontal orientation. 

The original is a one of a kind rendering.  Art quality giclees were created from the original rendering in an exclusive and limited production of 100.  Each giclee is individually produced through a high-resolution, high-fidelity process using a special large format art printer on thick archival art paper, and is signed and numbered by the artist. The giclees are exquistely and finely crafted, and as detailed as the original.  The item for sale in this listing is one of the limited series giclees.

For more information on giclees, please click here: 
http://tinyurl.com/giclee-info

Note: the watermark on this image is not part of the actual rendering, it is solely for purposes of internet display.

All rights reserved, copyright Quatrefoil Design. Artist retains copyright to rendering. For questions, please email us at quatrefoildesign@gmail.com. Special trade pricing available.

name: Architectural Rendering: Palmette (limited edition)
description:
Architectural Rendering: Palmette (limited edition)

Award winning architect Jonathan Lacrosse was commissioned to hand draw a series of architectural renderings in graphite; the renderings can be hung alone or as part of a series. They are reminiscent of 18th and 19th century engravings, and recapture an art that is all but lost in the modern day world.

The fifth in our exclusive architectural series is a Palmette or Anthemion Frize. Drawn from an existing example in Oakland Cemetery at Atlanta, Georgia (Atlanta ‘s oldest continuously used historic site) This frieze represents a Palmette Frieze, which is a series of artistic motifs which resemble the fan shaped leaves of a palm tree.  The palmette is also a symbol of rebirth and resurrection.  Incidentally it is believed that the fleur-de-lis is a variant of this ancient motif.

Rendering image is 8.5" x 13.25" (overall paper size 11" x 16.25").

The original is a one of a kind rendering.  Art quality giclees were created from the original rendering in an exclusive and limited production of 100.  Each giclee is individually produced through a high-resolution, high-fidelity process using a special large format art printer on thick archival art paper, and is signed and numbered by the artist. The giclees are exquistely and finely crafted, and as detailed as the original. The item for sale in this listing is one of the limited edition giclees.

name: Architectural Rendering: Bracket from Owens-Thomas House in Savannah
description:
Architectural Rendering: Bracket (limited edition)

Award winning architect Jonathan Lacrosse was commissioned to hand draw a series of architectural renderings in graphite; the renderings can be hung alone or as part of a series. They are reminiscent of 18th and 19th century engravings, and recapture an art that is all but lost in the modern day world. 

The second in our exclusive architectural series is a detailed bracket. This bracket is from the famed Owens-Thomas House in Savannah, Georgia, designed by English Architect William Jay in 1816. The bracket is one of four which help support the unique porch above; it was on this porch that the Marquis de Lafayette addressed the citizens of Savannah during his tour of the United States in 1825. The porch and brackets are made of cast iron and were manufactured in Birmingham, England. It is possibly the first example of the use of structural iron construction in the United States. 

The original is a one of a kind rendering. Art quality giclees were created from the original rendering in an exclusive and limited production of 100; the item in this listing is one of the giclees. Each giclee is individually produced through a high-resolution, high-fidelity process using a special large format art printer on thick archival art paper, and is signed and numbered by the artist. The giclees are exquistely and finely crafted, and as detailed as the original. The item is unframed. 

 Note: artist retains copyright to rendering. Cannot be reproduced for sale. Watermark image is for internet display purposes, and does not appear on the actual rendering.
